messages.subject: beautiful, snowy morning
messages.msgSnippet: Today was a beautiful snowy day. When I woke up late after having stayed up far too late last night, I didn t realize it had been snowing all night. It was
messages.messageBody:
Today was a beautiful snowy day. When I woke up late after having stayed
up far too late last night, I didn't realize it had been snowing all
night. It was beautiful. I lookeed out the window and noticed that the
school behind us is unoccupied today. Now I'm giving thanks that I
didn't have to wake up early and check the TV and radio to see that I
hadn't needed to get up early at all!

Unschooling joyously,

:-) Diane
